text: (nabiyē!) kavurun (saturan visin) vēdanā gena dīmen anaturuva (tamangē nivesvalin) piṭamaṁ vī yuddha kara, (vividha duk gæhæṭada) vin̆da darāgena (sthīra vaśayen) siṭiyōda, ovun venuven (ovunṭa varaprasādayan) pahaḷa kirīmaṭama niyata vaśayenma obagē deviyan min pasuvada, (ovunva) kṣamā karanneku hā (ovun kerehi) dayābaravantayeku vaśayenda siṭinnēya
